schemaDef.title: ContactMethod (Object)
schemaDef.description: A ContactMethod resource records the information for contacting a customer. You can define multiple contact methods for a customer.

Id.title: Id (GUID) Required on update only
Id.description: The identifier of the contact method.

CustomerId.title: CustomerId (GUID) Required
CustomerId.description: The identifier of the Customer associated with the contact method.

ContactMethodCategoryId.title: ContactMethodCategoryId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodCategoryId.description: The numeric code for the contact method category. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

ContactMethodTypeId.title: ContactMethodTypeId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodTypeId.description: The code representing the contact method type. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

Default.title: Default (Boolean) Optional
Default.description: A flag indicating whether this is the default contact method for the customer.

DoNotContact.title: DoNotContact (Boolean) Optional
DoNotContact.description: A flag indicating this customer is private; that is, it is not to be used by external systems (such as a marketing system). If not provided when the record is created, this field is set to true.

Notes.title: Notes (String) Optional
Notes.description: Notes related to this contact method.

Value.title: Value (String) Optional
Value.description: The information for that contact method: for example, the actual email address or phone number. Email addresses are validated (but not verified).

ContactMethodCategoryId.title: ContactMethodCategoryId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodCategoryId.description: The numeric code for the contact method category. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

ContactMethodTypeId.title: ContactMethodTypeId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodTypeId.description: The code representing the contact method type. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.
